text: Is there a consensus on specific American Greeting Cards Company cards that R. Crumb may have illustrated when he worked there between 1962-1966? Are there examples someone can share?  Thanks.
Measurements are 7" x 5". Flattened on both sides. No markings.
does anyone know of a sub-group for scrap metal sculpture art?

If you have any oriental artworks、 crafts、antiques、 coins that need to be identified, or you don’t recognize the words above. You can go to rednote APP to ask them, it’s very lively. My knowledge is limited, and the Chinese government does not like us to speak in foreign forums because they don’t know what we say.

You keep changing feedback and making it harder.  When I’m buying cards pick your cards option, it’s fine; but put’s them as individual withou the card # and name. It doesn’t allow giving feedback on each.

About 15 years ago, there were stimulating, interesting conversations about buying, selling, and comic books in general on this site. eBay killed that. I'm trying to start one on Face book: eBay Comics Community Buyers and Sellers. Search for it on FB and come join if you'd like to try to get something going that's better than this terrible site.

Hi.My Instagram account was hacked years ago and I want to repair the problem. Instagram won't help me restore my account using same email account I used to create it.How can I verbally get in touch with someone IT Instagram to help me? No one has ever replied via email, only Auto-Fill reply(ie)s have been sent and they are no help.I want to avoid creating another Instagram account and use the same email address that is connected to my eBay account.Any help and/or information will be gladly accepted.Thanks!
I'm looking for comics titles that are similar to scream halloween or I know what you did last summer if there is any killer clowns
He looks like a Smurf only he's light skinned.

Anybody else have this happen? You get a really high bid on an item then a few hours before the auction ends they recall/cancel that bid.  That really high bid being 25%+^ of FMV and 5+ X’s the next highest bid.  Its happened twice this week with the FOMO over USM1 & UBP1.
